column2: Aorist can have two different ways of expressing itself: These endings (σα or κα) or a stem change

column7:
Agent
 1. Direct - ὑπο + gen noun
  σωζομαι ὑπο θεου
   I am being saved by God
 2. Intermediate - δια + gen noun
  σωζομαι δια του ἀποστολου
   I am being saved by the apostle
 3. Impersonal - dat noun with or without ἐν
  σωζομαι (ἐν) τῳ λογῳ τουθεου
   I am being saved by the word of God

σ between vowels drops
ε+α=η η+ι=ῃ
